nodes.text: Chic and Sleek Kashyyyk was a hygiene product designed for the Wookiees of the planet Kashyyyk. It was advertised on the BSO 401.72 radio station that broadcast in Black Spire Outpost during the war between the First Order and the Resistance.
Chic and Sleek Kashyyyk Wookiee shampoo was first mentioned in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park on May 31, 2019.
